sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEVERIA, a province of the Ruffian empire, with the title of a duchy, bounded on the north by Smolenſko and Muſcovy, on the eaſt by Vorotinſhi and the country of the Coſſacks, on the ſouth by the same, and on the west by Zernegovia. It is a country overrun with woods, and on the ſouth part is a foreſt of great length. Novogrodec, or Novogorod, is the capital town.
